Text: i random checked it but looks like it might be +200ms out of sync or perhaps its just at the beginning.. since i havent watched it

confirmed its not too bad but annoying.. my random checks missed it its easy to fix with a tool called avimuxgui which is free. open it. click the large button under window then click the audo track on far side enter 200 and then click start/save and it will be done all in sync http://www.afterdawn.com/software/audio_video/video_tools/avi-mux_gui.cfm takes about 30seconds to fix and write the file!
the gui not too friendly.. right click on the window to load the avi too handy tool to know and use for many avi fixing
